      • getTopics

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTopics​(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                                         java.lang.String tableName)
        Get the unique values of topics in database with the connection conn, in the table tableName
        Parameters:
        conn - , Connection to the database
        tableName - , table of questions that we want to extract topics
        Returns:
        ArrayList of String, unique values of topics

      • assembleQuestion

        public static java.util.List<Question> assembleQuestion​(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                                        QuestionType questionType,
                                                        java.lang.String topic,
                                                        Difficulty difficulty)
        Assemble questions randomly based on the given question type, topic and difficulty
        Parameters:
        conn - , Connection, to the database
        questionType - , enum Questiontype, either OPENQUESTION or MCQQUESTION
        topic - , String, use getTopics to show available topics in the database
        difficulty - , enum Difficulty, either EASY, MEDIUM or HARD
        Returns:
        List of Question of the assembled questions
